sentences.en: Captain Carter: The armoury ? What do you wait to encounter there?
sentences.cn: 卡特: 军械库? 你想在那找到 什么 ?

sentences.en: Doctors have an armoury of drugs available.
sentences.cn: 医生都备有各种各样的药物。

sentences.en: Interest rates have become powerful weapons in the government’s armoury.
sentences.cn: 利率已成为政府锦囊中强大的法宝。

sentences.en: James Bond: Come on, lets go to armoury.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯?邦大眼猪加盟德: 来吧, 莪们往军械库.

sentences.en: James Bond: Come on, lets go to the armoury.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·邦德: 来吧, 我们去军械库.

sentences.en: Modern medicine has a large armoury of drugs for the treatment of mental illness.
sentences.cn: 现代医学有大量可以用来治疗精神疾病的药物。

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons will play a less prominent part in NATO's armoury in the future.
sentences.cn: 今后核武器在北约武器装备中所起的作用将不那么显著。

sentences.en: The enzyme armoury is sufficient to degrade most proteins to small peptides and amino acids.
sentences.cn: 这一酶库足以将大多数蛋白质降解成短肽和氨基酸.

trans.tran_cn: 军械库，兵工厂，军事建筑
trans.tran_en: a place where weapons are stored
